statements: UPDATE Courses SET course_name='Mathematics', instructor='John Doe', credits=4 WHERE course_id=101;
UPDATE Courses SET instructor='Mary Smith', credits=3, course_name='Physics' WHERE course_id=201;
UPDATE Courses SET credits = 4, course_name = 'Advanced Mathematics' WHERE course_id = 101
UPDATE Courses SET instructor = 'Dr. Smith', credits = 3 WHERE course_id = 102
UPDATE students SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE courses SET instructor = 'Jane Smith', schedule = 'Monday & Wednesday 3-5 PM', max_capacity = 30 WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE students SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE student_id = 123;
UPDATE courses SET enrolled_students = ARRAY_APPEND(enrolled_students, 123) WHERE course_id = 456;
UPDATE students SET enrolled_courses = 5 WHERE student_id = 101;
UPDATE courses SET instructor = 'John Doe', start_date = '2022-10-01' WHERE course_id = 201;
UPDATE students SET enrolled_courses = 4 WHERE student_id = 101;
UPDATE courses SET instructor = 'John Smith', start_date = '2023-01-15' WHERE course_id = 201;
UPDATE Course SET credits = 4 WHERE course_id = 101;
UPDATE Student SET major = 'Computer Science' WHERE student_id = 201;
UPDATE Course SET instructor='John Doe', credits=4 WHERE course_id=101;
UPDATE Student SET major='Computer Science', graduation_year=2023 WHERE student_id=201;
UPDATE students SET student_name = 'Alice', student_email = 'alice@example.com' WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE enrollments SET enrollment_date = '2022-09-01' WHERE student_id = 2 AND course_id = 101;
UPDATE students SET student_name = 'Alice', enrollment_status = TRUE WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE courses SET instructor_name = 'Dr. Smith', course_description = 'Advanced Course' WHERE course_id = 5;
